tasks.label: compile
tasks.command: if [[ "${fileExtname}" == ".c" ]]; then gcc -o ${fileBasenameNoExtension} ${file}; else g++ -std=c++17 -o ${fileBasenameNoExtension} ${file}; fi

tasks.label: compile and run
tasks.command: if [[ "${fileExtname}" == ".c" ]]; then gcc -o ${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out ${file}; else g++ -std=c++17 -o ${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out ${file}; fi && ./${fileBasenameNoExtension}.out
